title: MLB Network Presents
overview: MLB Network Presents is an original series of documentaries and access-driven profiles. Launched in January 2015, MLB Network Presents has produced programs covering many subjects across baseball, including the Emmy-nominated "The Story of Billy Bean" as well as "Holy Cow! The Story of Harry Caray," ".406," "56: The Streak," "The Bird," "The Colorful Montreal Expos" and "The Nasty Boys: The 1990 Cincinnati Reds."
